means: [医][=energy dispersive x-ray analysis]能量弥散的X线分析

sentence.Network_en: Analyses of EDAX show that sealing white line was glass spreading on oxide scale of pin.
sentence.Network_cn: EDAX分析表明,封接白线是销钉封接时玻璃沿销钉氧化膜的爬坡.

sentence.Network_en: The EDAX composition analysis demonstrates that the mass fraction of Y 2 O 3 is closely related to ore - collophane.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过EDAX能谱仪进行矿物成分分析,得出Y2O3质量分数与胶磷矿物密切相关的结论.

sentence.Network_en: The solid solution of Sr _ ( 1 - x ) Ca _ xCuO _ 2 is investigated by means of XRD, EPMA and EDAXmethods.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文用XRD 、 EPMA、EDAX等 方法,研究了Sr_ ( 1-x ) Ca_xCuO_2固溶体.
